content: in this legal case the court ruled that a rural area in montemignaio would be dissolved and given to the municipality of montemignaio the plaintiffs argued that the area should remain undivided coownership while the defendant believed it should be divided among the coowners the court determined that the property was not easily divisible due to its location and size so it granted the plaintiffs request for dissolution and assigned the property to the municipality the court also ordered the assignee to pay a settlement to the plaintiffs based on their respective shares the court addressed the issue of costs and decided they should be divided between the parties the ruling was made on june 5 2018 and the courtappointed experts report expenses will be split equally
